column5: Hi Everyone,  My friends and I are looking to book a muskie charter on Lake St. Clair this fall.  I'm interested in hearing the experiences you've had with some of the muskie charters.  Any feedback is appreciated.  Thanks.

I guide on the lake from a Ranger 621 up to 3 people all tackle included. I cast, jig and troll. There is picture of one fast last week when I filmed with Jim Saric of Musky Hunter in the contest-announcement page here at OFC. Thanks,
Yup, I would highly reccommend going out with bob! He's a stand up guy, great to spend a day on the water with!
Yup book with Bob you won't be disappointed
Thanks, guys.  Bob, sent you an email.
Thanks, I hope we can fit in our schedules.
BOBBY D.  i personally know and recommend bobby. the fall fishing can be a reel great trip on st clair. bob has spent countless hours er should i say worn out boats and motors chasin fish.
Bob is great but for something different try Jon Bondy. Jigging for muskies is exhilarating. http://bondybaitcompany.com/
